description: Implementation of algorithms for incremental computation of entropy and Gini index from time-changing data streams.
README.md:
# incremental
An open-source package implementing incremental formulas and algorithms for computing entropy and Gini index from time-changing data streams.

### References
- Blaz Sovdat. [Updating Formulas and Algorithms for Computing Entropy and Gini Index from Time-Changing Data Streams](http://arxiv.org/abs/1403.6348), arXiv:1403.6348.
